Compatible with iOS 8 to 12

With Mypomonella you can Set on All the Updates in All the Cydia Packages and Much More.

The Item (called CydiaPackagesUpDates) is now out from the Stage of My Repository with also the adding of The Preferences Bundles and other Stuff.

Also Included (integrations) Cydlight, HideCydiaPackages and CydiaFullScreen Tweaks available on my Repository.

Mypomonella gives also the chance to have other Extras Useful and Aesthetic options for Cydia.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Configure options from Settings.

See Screenshots below.

More Stuff to come!

iOS 11 is on Full Compatibility Stage in the Next Works.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!
